Service Details: - Improves home comfort and efficiency for qualifying low income renters and home owners in detached houses, townhouses, duplexes and mobile homes - The Energy Conservation Assistance Program (ECAP) provides qualified low-income BC Hydro and FortisBC residential account holders with FREE energy evaluation, installation of energy saving products by a qualified contractor, and energy efficiency advice
Eligibility: Please visit the website for details on eligibility and application
